1.details: Request Supabase project credentials from user to set up backend database, authentication, and storage for the scalable application.

2.details: Create modern, professional design system with responsive layouts for desktop, tablet, mobile. Include PWA capabilities for offline functionality. Design components for all core features.

3.details: Build comprehensive CRM: Customer profiles, contact management, measurement history, customer preferences, customer communication history, loyalty programs, customer notes, customer segmentation, birthday/anniversary tracking.

4.details: Implement measurement tracking: Digital measurement forms, 3D measurement integration, body type categorization, size standardization, fitting progress tracking, alteration notes, measurement history, custom measurement templates for different garment types (suits, shirts, dresses, etc.).

5.details: Complete order lifecycle: Order creation, status tracking (consultation, measurement, cutting, sewing, fitting, completion), order timeline, quality control checkpoints, delivery management, order notes, customer approvals, revision tracking.

6.details: Advanced scheduling: Trial appointments, fitting sessions, delivery dates, staff scheduling, calendar management, automated reminders (SMS/Email/WhatsApp), rescheduling capabilities, no-show tracking, appointment types and duration management.

7.details: Complete inventory system: Fabric stock tracking, supplier management, material ordering, cost calculation, fabric categorization (wool, cotton, silk, etc.), color matching, pattern management, low stock alerts, supplier relationship management, fabric quality tracking.

8.details: Comprehensive accounting: Invoice generation, payment tracking, deposit management, installment payments, tax calculations (UAE VAT), financial reporting, cost estimation, pricing models, payment processor integration (Stripe, local UAE processors), bookkeeping, profit/loss reports.

9.details: UAE-compliant payroll: Employee salary calculations, overtime tracking, end-of-service calculation, gratuity calculations, UAE labor law compliance, multiple salary structures, bonus management, salary deductions, bank transfer integration with UAE banks.

10.details: UAE-compliant attendance: Employee check-in/out, shift management, overtime calculation, leave management (annual, sick, maternity), UAE labor law compliance, biometric integration support, GPS-based attendance for field workers, attendance reports.

11.details: UAE-compliant payslips: Automated payslip generation, salary breakdowns, overtime details, deductions, allowances, end-of-service calculations, gratuity calculations, tax calculations, digital signatures, email distribution, historical payslip access.

12.details: Fabric waste tracking: Material waste calculation, cost impact analysis, waste reduction strategies, recycling tracking, sustainability reporting, waste disposal tracking, supplier feedback on fabric efficiency, waste optimization recommendations.

13.details: Customer satisfaction: Complaint tracking, feedback management, resolution workflows, customer satisfaction surveys, review management, complaint escalation, follow-up systems, service quality tracking.

14.details: Business intelligence: Order completion time analysis, employee productivity metrics, resource utilization, customer satisfaction scores, financial performance dashboards, efficiency benchmarking, performance trends, predictive analytics.

15.details: UAE regulatory compliance: VAT compliance reporting, labor law compliance, UAE business regulations, contract management, legal document storage, compliance alerts, audit trail, regulatory reporting.

16.details: Progressive Web App: Offline functionality, mobile-responsive design, push notifications, mobile payments, field measurement tools, customer mobile access, offline data synchronization, app-like experience on mobile devices.

17.details: Scalable infrastructure: Multi-tenant data isolation, role-based access control, white-label capabilities, thousands of users support, performance optimization, database sharding, CDN integration, backup systems, disaster recovery.

18.details: Third-party integrations: Payment gateways (UAE banks, Stripe), SMS/Email services, accounting software integration, government portal integration, courier services, fabric suppliers, banking APIs, tax filing systems.

19.details: Develop comprehensive tailoring management system with all features listed above. Implement using Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase backend, responsive design, PWA capabilities, and all UAE-specific requirements.

20.details: Deploy the application and provide comprehensive documentation for scaling to thousands of users, adding new features, maintaining the system, and UAE regulatory compliance.
